title: Le Pain Quotidien - Varenne
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. International restaurant chain featuring artisan bakery and communal table. Menu includes several ovo-lacto vegetarian dishes as well as vegan ones (denote by carrot sign).
